data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yu, Shuai, Park, Kyu-Tek, Wang, Shuxia (2019): Seven new species of the genus Deltoplastis Meyrick, 1925 (Lepidoptera: Lecithoceridae). Zootaxa 4619 (1): 155-167, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4619.1.7|28 occurrences
